description.p: Maybe it was the fact that people got to blow away Nazis. Maybe it was the sheer challenge of it all. For whatever reason Wolfenstein 3D pioneered the first-person shooter genre and brought its legendary creators, id Software, worldwide notoriety and numerous awards. In fact, The Computer Gaming World Hall of Fame recognized Wolfenstein 3D as helping to shape the overall direction of the computer gaming industry.

Wolf4SDL is an open-source port of id Software's classic first-person shooter Wolfenstein 3D to the cross-platform multimedia library "Simple DirectMedia Layer (SDL)". It is meant to keep the original feel while taking advantage of some improvements.
This package contains wolf4sdl compiled for playing the shareware version of Wolfenstein 3D, as well as the Wolfenstein 3D shareware data files.
